system.description:
A mustachioed, uniform wearing general who wields a saber. Intensely patriotic.

(The stats provided here is for a Rank 1 encounter. Check the book for higher ranks.)
system.attacks:
Inflict Violence: Fuego! Attack a fighter in range 3 with Bravery, and then another ally In Line may inflict violence.

Gambits [[/r d12]]

1-3: Inflict Violence > Inflict Violence > Inflict Violence

4-6: Rush > March [1]: The Heneral and all allies In Line may move 3, keeping adjacency. > Inflict Violence

7-9: Rush > Commandeer [2]: Two allies In Line may inflict violence. If less than two Inflict Violence, inflict 1 Hit on any 1 enemy in burst 3.

10-12: Impassioned Speech [3]: Give all allies In Line +Faith dice on their next Attack roll.

traits.name: Conviction
traits.description: All Folk have a reason for fighting, and if reasoned to, can cause them to rethink combat. However, they will fight for their Conviction until it looks like all is bleak.

traits.name: Morale
traits.description: At the beginning of any Resound where there are twice as many Kadungganan than there are enemies (eg., If there are 4 Kadungganan and 2 Enemies left) all Folk enemies will Surrender, becoming Defeated.

traits.name: Ashen Conquest
traits.description: All Virbanwans adjacent to each other are considered In Line. While In Line, they have +1 to all Defenses. When they start their riff while In Line, they and all Virbanwans In Line with them may rush 1, never breaking adjacency.

traits.name: Commander
traits.description: All allies in burst 2 of the Heneral are considered In Line. All allies In Line with the Heneral cannot fall below 1 HP.
